name: Billing Software Suite
description: A full-stack billing and retail solution featuring QR code generation, product scanning, and attendance tracking. Built with a modern React front-end and secured MongoDB back-end, it provides seamless invoice management, real-time product updates, and interactive dashboards for business insights.

name: EDFN PCB
description: A sleek, responsive landing page designed for a PCB manufacturing company. Developed with React and Tailwind CSS, it emphasizes clean layouts, optimized performance, and mobile-first design principles to effectively showcase services and drive customer engagement.

name: E-Learning Platform
description: A comprehensive e-learning system offering interactive courses, document sharing, online compiler, learning roadmaps, and community discussion forums. The platform ensures collaborative learning with scalable architecture, making it suitable for both students and professionals.
